sub_title: Corporate Finance - Business Partner at BHS Corrugated
summary:
I strive towards utilizing my academic background and professional experience to assist, consult, and guide organisations towards making better financial decisions and to generate a positive long-term impact. 

Through my previous roles, I specialized in portfolio construction and equity selection in the context of Emerging and Frontier markets, as well as portfolio optimization processes analysing the utilization of Active and Passive investment vehicles.

awards.title: Python Option Pricing Challenge
awards.description: Through the advanced use of python, my team and I built an interactive platform for users to compute prices of exotic options using data inputs. Our platform was able to calculate: Barrier Options, Rainbow Options, Asian Options, and Bermuda Options, and Compound Options.

awards.title: The Exeter Award
awards.description: Awarded to students with outstanding academics while working within the community for more than 25 hours a week. The award signifies a meticulous ability to maintain a balance between academics and professional life, while being able to reflect upon the positive impact of the student's work on the surrounding community.

profile_positions.description: As a Business Partner I work alongside various business units and BHS global subsidiaries providing financial information, tools, analysis, and insights to executives- leading corporate growth and strategy.
profile_positions.title: Corporate Finance - Business Partner

profile_positions.description:
Orienta Capital offers wealth and financial advisory services to institutions and ultra-high net worth individuals. Within my role, I optimized the firm’s asset allocation decisions between Active and Passive investment management strategies.

•	Designed a proprietary dynamic framework to identify the optimal allocation between investment strategies based on investors’ outlook and risk appetite characteristics. Generating a customized solution per investor, in line with their personal characteristic and investment goals.
•	Collaborated and built strong relations with industry leaders, and global academics, gathering practical perspectives as well as theoretical approaches to support the fundamentals of the model.
•	[In progress] Published the findings of the model in the form of a white-paper across different financial publication platforms; assisting manager selectors make implicit portfolio construction decisions explicit.
profile_positions.title: Strategic Asset Allocation Analyst

profile_positions.description:
TCM Investment Funds specialise in high yield equity investing with a focus on Emerging and Frontier markets. Within my role I empirically examined potential modifications to the fund’s current asset selection strategy, and proposed points for further exploration.

•	Developed a unique econometric methodology for model analysis using Python, examining the foresight advantages derived from the relationship between Dividend Payout and Future Earnings Growth.
•	Computed statistical diagnostics using MATLAB and STATA to evaluate data characteristics and determine an appropriate regression analysis approach and model interpretation technique.
•	Analyzed over three million data points aggregated using Refinitiv Eikon, and Bloomberg Terminals to uncover potential alpha opportunities through payout structure analysis.
•	Constructed a report and presented the data insights to the firm’s senior stakeholders, leading to further examinations of the fund’s asset selection criteria based on the study’s proposed amendments.
profile_positions.title: Strategy Advisory

profile_positions.description:
•	Automated the loan and interest payments reconciliation process using Excel VBA: improving task time efficiency by up to 25%. The Macros created remain applicable and are still utilized by the office today.
•	Built and regularly updated stress-test analysis models of the client’s creditors to gauge changes in investment risks across various tax and economic scenarios. Proposing bespoke recommendations suitable for the client’s outlook.
•	Applied academic expertise in the review and preparation of consolidated group accounts, particularly ensuring accurate recognition and measurement in line with IAS 38: Intangible Assets.
•	Created timely, accurate, and in-depth financial commentary reports on the effects of potential business acquisitions on the consolidated accounts of one of Bucharest’s largest Alternative Investment Funds.
profile_positions.title: Audit Intern

profile_positions.description:
A highly selective professional learning and development scheme tailored for preparing candidates towards KPMG’s consultancy and audit divisions through development of interpersonal and technical skills required in the field.

•	Conducted sub-weekly seminars on the applicable IFRS’s effecting the current engagements of the Audit staff. Preparing easy to understand applications of the most recent amendments to the framework.
•	Two-time winner of the monthly technical challenge, requiring candidates to solve real case study complications by employing Excel Macros or Matlab tools under a short time limit.
•	Selected to coordinate all collaborations with KPMG Paris ADA branch, working closely with the two management teams to prepare the final project using real client data.
